sentences.en: All memorable events, I should say, transpire in morning time and in a morning atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 我敢说, 所有值得回顾的事件, 都发生在清晨的光阴和气氛里.
究竟发生了什么一直无人知晓。

sentences.en: It now transpires that he kept all the money for himself.
sentences.cn: 事实已经清楚，他把所有的钱都据为己有了。

sentences.en: Train envision ability of the, and innovation ability, transpire their thoughts. To cultivate students'practice ability.
sentences.cn: 2培养学生的想象能力, 创新能力, 发散性思维; 提高他们的动手能力.

sentences.en: Train the envision ability of the students, and innovation ability, transpire their thoughts.
sentences.cn: 培养学生的想象能力, 创新能力, 发散性思维.

sentences.en: Unless you truly don't care how things transpire, take the reins this week.
sentences.cn: 除非你真的不在乎,如果你还是介意的, 请在这周好好地、骄傲地把握住吧!

sentences.en: We do not know what may transpire when we have a new boss.
sentences.cn: 当新老板来后,我们不知会有什么发生.

sentences.en: We do not know what will transpire when we have a new boss.
sentences.cn: 当我们有位新老板时,不知会发生什么.

sentences.en: We don't know what will transpire when we have a new boss.
sentences.cn: 当我们有位新老板时,不知会发生什麽.

words.tran_cn: 蒸发，散发；[植] 蒸腾作用；[航] 流逸

trans.tran_cn: 发生, 得知, 使蒸发, 使排出
使蒸发，使排出，[医]发汗，（秘密）被泄漏
